item.title: Muzarabani, Ngarava Power Zimbabwe Past Oman in Thrilling ODI Encounter
item.description: Zimbabwe secured a convincing victory over Oman, thanks to impressive performances from Muzarabani and Ngarava in a thrilling ODI match.
